paragraphs.text:
val trainDataPath = "data_session_train"
val userVectorFileName = "userVector.map"
val itemVectorFileName = "itemVector.map"

msg.data:
trainDataPath: String = data_session_train
userVectorFileName: String = userVector.map
itemVectorFileName: String = itemVector.map

paragraphs.text:
val data = senv.readTextFile(trainDataPath)

val lastFM = data.map(line => {
    val fieldsArray = line.split(" ")
    (fieldsArray(1).toInt, fieldsArray(2).toInt, 1.0)})
